identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a premium, dark-mode fitness application that feels like a high-performance cockpit, not a generic SaaS dashboard.

theme_strategy.core_concept: Tactical Minimalism. The interface should feel like elite sports equipmentâ€”matte black, precision-engineered, with high-visibility neon accents for critical data.

headings.usage: All section headers, hero titles, and metric values.

primary.name: Volt Lime
primary.usage: Primary CTAs, active states, progress bars (high performance).

landing_page.rules: Asymmetry is mandatory. Never center the hero text. Use negative space aggressively.

dashboard.rules: High density. Every pixel must be utilized. Use 'h-full' on children to ensure alignment.

spacing.rule: Containers with borders must have internal padding (p-6 or p-8) to prevent text collision.

buttons.primary: bg-[#CCFF00] text-black font-bold uppercase tracking-wider hover:bg-[#b3e600] rounded-none skew-x-[-10deg]
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-white/20 text-white hover:bg-white/10 rounded-none skew-x-[-10deg]

cards.dashboard: bg-[#0A0A0A] border border-white/5 rounded-xl p-6 hover:border-white/10 transition-colors

charts.style: Minimalist. Remove grid lines. Use custom tooltips with glassmorphism.

images.description: Dark, moody gym setting with focus and negative space.
Green neon abstract waves for backgrounds.

assets.icons: Lucide React (default). Use thin strokes (1.5px) for elegance.

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid #050505 or #0A0A0A.
DO NOT use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Barlow Condensed'.
ALWAYS use 'backdrop-blur-xl' for glass elements, not just opacity.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast. Use White for headings, Grey-400 for body.
Mobile-first: Images must not exceed 80vh on mobile.
Animations: Use 'framer-motion' for entrance effects. Stagger children.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a high-performance fitness app. Stick to the 'Neon Obsidian' theme. Use the provided image URLs for the respective sections. Implement the 'Tetris Grid' for the landing page and 'Bento Grid' for the dashboard. Ensure the 'Barlow Condensed' font is loaded and used for all headings.
